text: Debbie McGee (born 31 October 1958) is an English television and radio presenter. She is best known for being magician Paul Daniels' assistant. McGee is a former ballet dancer. She presents a Sunday morning show for BBC Radio Berkshire. == Other websites == * Official website * Category:1958 births Category:English radio personalities Category:English television presenters Category:People from London Category:Living people
title: Debbie McGee
